articles.title: Sunak ponders political future as wife escapes Downing Street heat
articles.text: For a man who watched with incredulity and not a little disapproval when the personal and political fused into a crisis for Boris Johnson, the past week has been a difficult one for Rishi Sunak and his team.

articles.title: Civilians went to the station to escape. It turned into a killing zone
articles.text: The girl lay on a metal gurney, her face turned to the side, eyes closed, her blonde hair tied back in a ponytail. She was dressed in a shiny blue coat and black trousers.
